author: Amir Hossein Karimi
about_me_text: I am 21 years old. I started web development a year and half ago.After 4 month of internship I learned a lot about web (frontend->react). After that I worked as a freelancer and tried to develop myself alongside. I love learning new things and challenging myself to do so. If you think i am not as experienced as you think you can give a challenge and i assure you i can make the job done.
useVpn: if a page won't load please try vpn
